answers.answer: Well good luck love can't wait to see pictures :)) sending prayers your way
Awww yay :) Im so excited for u.! I can't wait to have my son, I still have 5 weeks to go. Good luck hun & congrats.!!
thanks ladies. its gonna be a LOONG night but.. its worth it to hold him :)
Well your finish line is within hours of reach.. good luck with labor and delivery and welcome baby for us!
Wow bet you didnt expect that when you woke up this morning eh lol good luck x
I'm 35+4 n everytime i have went to the docs i have had protein n my urine n they told me it's nothing to worry about.  So maybe its different for someBut gud luck n congratulations

Congratulations. I know you can't wait because I'm only 18w4d and I'm ready to hold my little man.. A girl I know had preeclampsia in both of her pregnancies and it was BAD her feet and hands turned "black" and she was really swollen so atleast he decided to nip this in the bud early.
How exciting! Wishing you a fast and easy labor. Congrats!!
Thanks ladies :) i will definitely. post pics soon :)

question: so i just turned 38 weeks and my dr found prtein in my urine and said i have a MILD case of preclampsia so he wants him out now before it gets bad. he didnt seem worrie about it but HOLY CRAP! my son will be here tomorrow!! :):) prayers are welcome
title: being induced today in an hour!
